name: Spacegenie
0:
”Alexa open Space genie”
”Alexa ask Space genie for a fact”
”Alexa tell Space genie to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space genie
des:
Ask for Space genie, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Space genie provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Space genie" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
